verses.verse: So these three<WH7969> men<WH582> ceased<WH7673> to answer<WH6030> Job,<WH347> because he was righteous<WH6662> in his own eyes.<WH5869>

Then the wrath<WH639> of Elihu<WH453> the son<WH1121> of Barachel,<WH1292> the Buzite,<WH940> of the family<WH4940> of Ram,<WH7410> was kindled<WH2734> against Job.<WH347> His wrath<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> because he justified<WH6663> himself<WH5315> rather than God.<WH430>
Also his wrath<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> against his three<WH7969> friends,<WH7453> because they had found<WH4672> no answer,<WH4617> and yet had condemned<WH7561> Job.<WH347>
Now Elihu<WH453> had waited<WH2442> to speak<WH1697> to Job,<WH347> because they were elder than he.<WH2205>
When Elihu<WH453> saw<WH7200> that there was no answer<WH4617> in the mouth<WH6310> of these three<WH7969> men,<WH582> his wrath<WH639> was kindled.<WH2734>

Elihu<WH453> the son<WH1121> of Barachel<WH1292> the Buzite<WH940> answered,<WH6030> <WH559> "I am young,<WH6810> and you are very old;<WH3453> Therefore I held back,<WH2119> and didn't<WH3372> dare show<WH2331> you my opinion.<WH1843>
I said,<WH559> <WH3117> 'Days should speak,<WH1696> and multitude<WH7230> of years<WH8141> should teach<WH3045> wisdom.<WH2451>'
But<WH403> there is a spirit<WH7307> in man,<WH582> and the breath<WH5397> of the Almighty<WH7706> gives them understanding.<WH995>
It is not the great<WH7227> who are wise,<WH2449> nor the aged<WH2205> who understand<WH995> justice.<WH4941>
Therefore I said,<WH559> <WH8085> 'Listen to me;<WH2331> I also will show my opinion.<WH1843>'
"Behold,<WH3176> I waited for your words,<WH1697> and I listened<WH238> for your reasoning,<WH8394> while you searched out<WH2713> what to say.<WH4405>
Yes,<WH995> I gave you my full attention, but there was no one who convinced<WH3198> Job,<WH347> or who answered<WH6030> his words,<WH561> among you.
Beware lest you say,<WH559> <WH4672> 'We have found wisdom,<WH2451> God<WH410> may refute<WH5086> him,<WH376> not man;'
for he has not directed<WH6186> his words<WH4405> against me;<WH7725> neither will I answer him with your speeches.<WH561>
"They are amazed.<WH2865> They answer<WH6030> no more.<WH6275> They don't have a word to say.<WH4405>
Shall I wait,<WH3176> because they don't<WH1696> speak, because they stand still,<WH5975> and answer no more?<WH6030>
I also will answer<WH6030> my part,<WH2506> and I also will show<WH2331> my opinion.<WH1843>
For I am full<WH4390> of words.<WH4405> The spirit<WH7307> within<WH990> me constrains me.<WH6693>
Behold,<WH990> my breast is as wine<WH3196> which has no vent;<WH6605> like new<WH2319> wineskins<WH178> it is ready to burst.<WH1234>
I will speak,<WH1696> that I may be refreshed.<WH7304> I will open<WH6605> my lips<WH8193> and answer.<WH6030>
Please don't<WH5375> let me respect any man<WH376>'s person,<WH6440> neither will I give flattering titles<WH3655> to any man.<WH120>
For I don't<WH3045> know how to give flattering titles;<WH3655> or else my Maker<WH6213> would soon<WH4592> take me away.<WH5375>
